title: Martha's Cross
description: Martha's Cross is the first book in a series of four, featuring Sue Gupta. She is an accidental detective whose maiden venture is solving a murder that took place sixty years ago in the small town of Bhind. While doing this she also embarks on a journey of self-discovery and awareness, addressing various social issues that surround her. Sue's friend, confidante and guide, is an orange tabby called Macavity who has mysterious powers
author: Semanti Sinha Ray
